params._backing: The amount of backing to give the proposal (up to user's reputation)
params._currPrevId: The current previous proposal in the list
params._key: A reputation hash tree key, of the caller's reputation in _domainId
params._newPrevId: The new previous proposal after we re-arrange
params._value: Reputation value indicating the caller's reputation in _domainId

params._prevId: The id of the preceding proposal in the linked list

params._domainId: The domain the extension has the funding permission
params._fromChildSkillIndex: The index of the fromPot's domain in _domainId.children[]
params._fromPot: Funding pot id providing the funds
params._toChildSkillIndex: The index of the toPot's domain in _domainId.children[]
params._toPot: Funding pot id receiving the funds

params._deprecated: Indicates whether the extension should be deprecated or undeprecated

params._payload: Function call to make via meta transaction
params._user: Address of user trying to do meta transaction

returns.nextId: The next proposal Id in the list

params._colony: The colony in which the extension holds permissions

params._key: A reputation hash tree key, of the total reputation in _domainId
params._value: Reputation value indicating the total reputation in _domainId

backProposal(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Back a funding proposal and advance it along the list

cancelProposal(uint256,uint256).notice: Cancel a funding proposal and remove from linked list

deprecate(bool).notice: Called when deprecating (or undeprecating) the extension

executeMetaTransaction(address,bytes,byt.notice: Main function to be called when user wants to execute meta transaction. The actual function to be called should be passed as param with name functionSignature Here the basic signature recovery is being used. Signature is expected to be generated using personal_sign method.

getMetatransactionNonce(address).notice: Gets the next nonce for a meta-transaction

getNextProposalId(uint256).notice: Gets the id of the next proposal in the list

getProposal(uint256).notice: Get the proposal struct for a given proposal

getProposalCount().notice: Get the total number of proposals

getSupport(uint256,address).notice: Gets the reputation support from a user to a proposal

identifier().notice: Returns the identifier of the extension

reclaimStake(uint256).notice: Reclaim the stake after the proposal is funded

version().notice: Returns the version of the extension
